thread.title: All Pro Dad Father & Kids Experience
thread.title_full: All Pro Dad Father & Kids Experience

title: All Pro Dad Father & Kids Experience
text:
All Pro Dad Father & Kids Experience Where 
2:30 p.m. Saturday, Nov. 7, 2015 Categories 
Events, Kids | Family, Sports Miami-area fathers and children will have the opportunity to enjoy an afternoon with Miami Dolphins Hall of Famer Larry Little. The All Pro Dad Father & Kids Experience provides fathers with fun and inspirational opportunities to strengthen their relationships with their kids. The family event will include tips, interactive games and hands-on experiences designed to motivate each father to become an All Pro Dad! For more information on the All Pro Dad Father & Kids Experience, visit AllProDad.com. Admission is $15 per family
